snippet.title: ⛩️ Phenomeno: Chapter 1, Flow
snippet.description:
Phenomeno is a Visual Novel adaptation of the first 2 books in the Phenomeno Horror/Mystery series. It was released as freeware to promote the books.

Yamada Nagito (or Nagi) was always fascinated by the occult. However, nothing exiting happens in his rural hometown.

When the opportunity arises to go to Tokyo University he is thrilled not only because it is a chance to experience the busy city life but he can also get a degree that can help his father's struggling business.

In need of a cheap place to stay he hears of the "House That Grants Wishes" which is going for a ridiculously low price. He rents the place but is tortured by strange noises after midnight, not only that but after a few nights the number 7 is carved on a wall.

Then he finds a 6 and then a 5... it is clear that it is a countdown for something. Nagi asks for help from the occult website he frequents, Ikaigabuchi, and arranges an offline meeting in hopes of figuring out what the countdown means.

Story written by Hajime Ninomae and illustrated by Yoshitoshi ABe.
English translation by Suimin Chuudoki, patched by Pin201.

Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwjp3w_QcYD7-_ZU-Mt8LWBuThaBjv5QJ
